content.html: If you were impacted by the recent AWS outage, the decision to invest in multi-cloud / multi-datacenter is simple: How much did this outage cost you vs the cost of adding a (lot) more complexity & maintenance with multi-cloud/DC? If outage cost >> this, only then do it.
content.value:
If you were impacted by the recent AWS outage, the decision to invest in multi-cloud / multi-datacenter is simple:

How much did this outage cost you vs the cost of adding a (lot) more complexity & maintenance with multi-cloud/DC?

If outage cost >> this, only then do it.
